title: What happen here?
review: I am always concerned about remakes of classic films many years after the original was released. This film confirms my concerns. It is slow, disjointed and really is a far cry from the original.

title: It wasn't as bad as my rating
review: The acting in the film is quite good. I would give that part an 8. The down side is the movies massive attempt at painting Tonya Harding in a good light. I still feel she was a great part of her own demise.

title: A Stunning Film
review: It's hard not to become emotional if you can put yourself into the characters in this film. What happens when the man you love disappears only to resurface 5 years later? The soundtrack is so perfectly written for the film. It evokes many feelings throughout the film.

title: Still don't understand
review: Even after seeing the movie and reading articles about what it is supposed to be about, I still don't under stand it. It's a tough film to watch and my best guess is that it is an art house type film. Yes scary at times but really full of allegories.
